author: bsullivan
msg: Trinidad-2502 Finish RenderKit Test Improvements so we can always run all tests

author: smartini
msg: PIVOT-689, change default values in DropShadowDecorator to (3, 3, 3) because most usage inside Pivot already use that value.

author: markt
msg: Improve performance of org.apache.tomcat.util.file.Matcher which is to filter JARs for scanning during web application start. Based on a patch by Sheldon Shao.
